'''''Amon Hen'' 287''' is the two-hundred-and-eighty-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in January [[2021]].

==Contents==

* Cover Art: Varda
** By: Telpefinde
* Annual General Meeting
* Tolkien Tabletop #3
** By: Daniel Marchant
* Review: Tolkienography
** By: Lance A. Green
* Walter Hooper
** By: [[Colin Duriez]]
* A love letter to Nature
** By: Christopher Shefford
* Richard C. West
** By: Charles E. Noad
* On the origin of the Hobbits - Part One -
** By: James P. Buchman
* The Hobbit, Fire & Water
** By: Norloth
* Toughest quiz ever: Answers
* Mathom
** By: Jan Boom
* News From Fangorn
** By: Carol Brownlow
* All Bran
** By: Ian Spittlehouse
* Back Page
** By: Sam by Liz Klochkova
